message: What are your thoughts on words have power in the sense that what you say could manifest something in some realm that affects us?
I just happened across this link on Twitter http://str.typepad.com/weblog/2011/07/the-power-of-words-video.html
prayer affects us? but i presume you mean like positive and negative words, words of bonding ... that sort of mystical stuff?
Mostly superstition. Psychology has taught us, however, that words can affect a persons psyche, but I think that's a different issue...
Did you guys watch the video?
do you know someone that believes in the speak it live it make it wow it style... thinger?

I've been told a few times in my younger Christian days being told not to talk about fears or Satan issues cause that could cause problems etc. In fact I also remember a while back in the car with @LintonCaldecott and I said "damn it man" and @LintonCaldecott told me not to use the word damn because I could be condemning something or I don't have the right to condemn anything. Something like that :)
I think that you are making up stories about me now.
